content:
Scenario: Farm owner transitions from sole proprietor to worker cooperative facilitator
    Given Tom has owned and operated Johnson Farm individually for 20 years
    And farmworkers have been employees without ownership or governance voice
    When Tom considers converting farm to worker-owned cooperative
    Then he sees how democratic restaurant conversions empowered workers
    And EAE network offers acquisition support for farm democratic conversion
    And Tom can transition from sole owner to cooperative member or honored exit
    And farmworkers gain ownership pathway transforming agricultural labor
    And workplace_elohim facilitates farm conversion following restaurant model
